title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. However, if the combo list is dropped down, it will take focus.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not result in it taking focus (Photon).
EB: The focus should be set on the first Combo when it is clicked.
SR: To replicate the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog and press the 'Tab' key. The focus should move to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
